description:
Jan Kugo grew up alone and abandoned, but dreamed of becoming a space pilot, despite knowing that his background would make this difficult. When he learned that a certain professor Dodge needed a subject for a scientific experiment, aiming at creating a super strong cyborg, Kugo volunteered.
Jan Kugo is short-tempered and violent, carefree and fearless. He enjoys battle and kills without hesitation. But though seemingly ruthless and sometimes cruel, deep down he has a heart of gold.
He flies the vessel Starcrow and wields the Astro-lance.
His character is based on the monkey-demon, Sun Wukong.
name: Jan Coogo
